title: My PBE cilent won't load
body:
Whenever I click the client button it says "The program can't start because BugSplat.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem." And when I did reinstall it still said it wasn't there...

Can I get some info on how to solve this???

replies.body: Did you make sure you installed the PBE to the default C:\ drive with admin rights? I'd suggest reinstalling and making sure you give League the permissions it needs by following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).
